flavor_text: If its rage peaks it becomes so hot that anything thattouches it will instantly go up in flames.
It has a secret devastating move. It rubs its blaz ing fur together to cause huge explosions.
When heat from its body causes the air around it toshimmer this is a sign that it is ready to battle.
TYPHLOSION obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames.This Pokemon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
